resources.string: This App is made for students of Vellore Institute Of Technology , but it will work with any ProntoNetworks host.

- New SlidingTab Layout 
 - Multiple Accounts 
 - Timer For Auto-Login 
 - Stable and Better UI

If your Wifi is Turned Off , app will show a button in bottom , click that to turn wifi On and it will try to connect to VOLSBB automatically .(If Mobile Data is turned On , it will turn it off mobile-data automatically in the way of turning wifi on ) Sometimes it doesn\'t connect to VOLSBB in the first attempt ,so try again , or manually connect from settings.

Enter The details at the after you dismiss this dialog . You can have multiple accounts and just tap the account you want to use (A green tick will appear on that Account)

Once you Log-In you can View your Usage also . When you log-in only then you can see option to see your usage as Session Id changes every time you Login . 

There is also a feature to set Auto-Timer Login in app , First select the frequency of Auto-Login and then when to cancel this Timer . You can also cancel all timers directly by clicking Cancel Instantly .
